scripts.build:postcss: postcss style.css style-editor.css style-h5p.css --replace --use autoprefixer --use cssnano
scripts.build: yarn-or-npm run build:sass && yarn-or-npm run build:postcss
scripts.watch: chokidar style.scss style-editor.scss style-h5p.scss assets/css --ignore "/.*\.css/" --initial --command 'yarn-or-npm run build'
scripts.bundle:zip: zip -x .\* -x package.json -x node_modules/\* -x yarn.lock -x yarn-error.log -rq klasse-wir-singen.zip ./
scripts.bundle: yarn-or-npm run build && yarn-or-npm run bundle:clean && yarn-or-npm run bundle:zip
